TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TrackingChannel extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示追蹤通道的 基底類別。

span.span: The base class that represents a tracking channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 如果存在 ，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫 以取得工作流程執行個體的追蹤通道。If a is present, the runtime tracking infrastructure calls to get a tracking channel for a workflow instance. 每當追蹤基礎結構符合工作流程執行個體關聯的 中的追蹤點時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構就會使用此追蹤通道將與工作流程執行個體關聯的追蹤記錄傳送回主應用程式。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this tracking channel to send tracking records associated with the workflow instance back to the host application whenever the tracking infrastructure matches a track point in the associated with the workflow instance. 您的應用程式可以用您選擇的任何方法處理這些追蹤資訊。Your application can treat this tracking information in any way you choose. 例如， 會將追蹤資訊寫入至 SQL 資料庫。For example, the writes tracking information to a SQL database. 若要為您的追蹤服務建立追蹤通道，請從 基底類別衍生一個類別。To create a tracking channel for your tracking service, derive a class from the base class. 您可以使用執行階段追蹤基礎結構在呼叫您的 的實作中傳遞的 物件，將您的每個追蹤通道執行個體與特定工作流程執行個體產生關聯。You can use the object passed by the runtime tracking infrastructure in its call to your implementation of to associate each instance of your tracking channel with a specific workflow instance. 工作流程執行階段引擎會向已經提供工作流程執行個體 的每個追蹤服務要求追蹤通道。The workflow runtime engine requests a tracking channel from each tracking service that has provided a for a workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstanceCompletedOrTerminated() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，通知追蹤通道上的資料接收者關於與追蹤通道關聯的工作流程執行個體已完成或終止。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, notifies a receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel has either completed or terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫 ，以通知追蹤通道上的資料接收者關於與此追蹤通道關聯的工作流程執行個體已完成或終止。The runtime tracking infrastructure calls to notify the receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with this tracking channel has either terminated or completed. 追蹤通道上不會再傳送任何資料。No more data will be sent on the tracking channel. 呼叫 時，您可以執行您的 類別的實作所需的任何動作。When is called, you may perform whatever actions are required by your implementation of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract void Send (System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord record);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Send(class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord record) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Sub Send (record As TrackingRecord)

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，在 上傳送 。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, sends a on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會在符合 中的追蹤點時，呼叫 以在 上傳遞 。The runtime tracking infrastructure calls to deliver a on the when it matches a track point in a . 您可以使用您的應用程式要求的任何方式來處理在 上傳送的追蹤資訊。You can treat the tracking information sent on the in whatever manner the requirements of your application dictate. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範 Send 方法的實作。The following example demonstrates an implementation of the Send method. 在此實作中，追蹤訊息會在工作流程終止時寫入事件日誌中。In this implementation, tracking messages are written to the event log when a workflow terminates. 這個範例來自＜終止追蹤服務 SDK＞範例。This sample is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[終止追蹤服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439).
